Primary Energy: Negative 4 (planting compulsion in mind) Supporting Energy: Space 2 (medium range) / Time 3 (duration up to 8 hours) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: 8 hours (or until completed) Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Target at medium range makes [[/save type=will]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, you suggest a course of activity (1-2 sentences) that sounds reasonable. Target pursues the activity for the duration or until completing it. Obviously harmful suggestions end the weave. Creatures immune to charm are immune. Saving Throw: Will (to resist mental compulsion) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 hour, 2 = full effect (8 hours), 3 = 24 hours, 4 = very hard to resist (they need Fortune on future saves if conditions change)
